result.title: Model of quality project delivery mechanism developed from lessons learned from SAFE-Aqua

result.title: Methods for metabolites analysis in shrimp intestines
result.description: Metabolites will be extracted from shrimp intestines from T5.1. The frozen tissues will be lyophilized, ground and extracted with chloroform/methanol/water-based solution. The extraction conditions will be optimized to obtain maximum yield of the targeted metabolites involved in quorum sensing pathway. The extracted metabolites will be subjected to UPLC-MS/MS. Chromatographic separation and mass spectrometry parameters will be optimized to specific extracts to acquire the mass profiles.

result.title: Cities open governance models
result.description: This deliverable will model planning processes of partner cities in BPMN/UML use case modelling and identify potential scenarios where open data can be used for participatory planning and decision making. These process models will be used to identify commonalities in the planning processes and to develop a generic open governance model.

result.title: IMOVE Living Labs: high-level progress report (final)
result.description: The final high-level report covering and crosslinking the activities from the independent LLs and extracting conclusions of a general interest beyond the individual LLs. Based on developments and achievements from the third and final iteration of IMOVE LLs, this report is generated out of the detailed account of final LLs results provided in D4.9.

result.title: NEMO website
result.description: Related to task 8.3.2 and task 8.3.3. External communication through a smart phone-friendly, responsive Project Website, continuously updated by KU Leuven and smartly aligned with other news feeds (SIM² KU Leuven, EIT RawMaterials, EURELCO etc.). NEMO website will also centralise all relevant peer-reviewed publications in high impact journals, conference papers and technical articles.
